磏字的基本解释

磏
lián
红色磨石。
自励；磨练：“行剑攻杀，暴憿之民也，而世尊之曰磏勇之士。”

磏
qiān
〔大磏〕地名，在中国贵州省。

磏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lián］
［《集韻》離鹽切，平鹽，來。］
(1)赤色的砺石。亦泛指有棱角的石块。
(2)引申为激励；磨练。

磏字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　磏； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页834第32
【集韻】【韻會】離鹽切【正韻】力鹽切，?音廉。【說文】厲石也。一曰赤色。　又磏仁。【韓詩外傳】仁道有四磏爲下，仁磏則其德不厚。【註】磏者，言刻意求仁，與聖仁，智仁，德仁異也。　又【字彙補】古文廉字。註詳广部十畫。

磏字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
磏字的起名意思

暂无。

Xun
Basic explanation of words
Xun
lián
Red grindstone.
Self-encouragement; tempering: "Strikes and kills with swords, and the violent people are also, and the world-honored person is called the warrior."
Xun
qiān
〔大磏〕The place name is in Guizhou Province, China.
Xun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lián］
["Jiyun" cut from salt, flat salt, come. ]
(1) Red stone. It also refers to angular stones.
(2) The extension is motivation; tempering.
Xun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Stone Character Department] 　磏; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 834 32
[Jiyun] [Rhyme] Cut from the salt [Zhengyun] Cut the salt with force, and the sound is clean. [Said Wen] Li Shi also. One said red.　You Xunren. 【Han Shiwai Biography】Benevolence has four subordinates, and Ren Xun is not strong in virtue. [Note] The man who speaks deliberately seeks benevolence, and is different from Shengren, Zhiren, and Virtue.　[Word Supplement] Ancient Chinese Lianzi. Note the ten paintings of Guangbu in detail.
Xun
